actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend section 788(d) of the Public Health Service Act to permit schools of nursing to obtain grants for training projects in geriatrics.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to add schools of nursing as eligible recipients of certain grants for training projects relating to geriatric medicine.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 788(d) of the Public Health Service Act to permit schools of nursing to obtain grants for training projects in geriatrics.
